name: Smart Commute Assistant - Real-Time Traffic Intelligence

nodes.name: Schedule Trigger
nodes.notes: Runs at 7AM, 8AM for morning commute and 5PM, 6PM for evening commute on weekdays

nodes.name: Weather Check
nodes.notes: Gets current weather and checks for rain conditions

nodes.name: Weather Forecast
nodes.notes: Gets 3-hour forecast to predict rain during commute

nodes.name: News Scraper - Traffic Updates
nodes.notes: Scrapes local news for traffic incidents, road closures, and protests

nodes.name: Social Media Scraper
nodes.notes: Scrapes Twitter for real-time traffic updates from locals

nodes.name: Official Traffic Data Scraper
nodes.notes: Scrapes official traffic police and government sites for authoritative traffic data

nodes.name: Google Maps - Primary Routes
nodes.notes: Gets multiple route options with real-time traffic data

nodes.name: Google Maps - Alternative Routes
nodes.notes: Gets alternative routes avoiding highways for comparison

nodes.name: AI Decision Engine
nodes.notes: Advanced decision engine that combines all data sources and applies intelligent scoring

nodes.name: Send Enhanced Slack Notification
nodes.notes: Sends rich notification with interactive buttons and detailed data

nodes.name: Send Telegram Notification
nodes.notes: Alternative notification via Telegram with inline buttons

nodes.name: Emergency Alert Filter
nodes.notes: Identifies emergency traffic conditions and triggers immediate alerts

parameters.content:
üöÄ **SMART COMMUTE ASSISTANT**

**What this workflow does:**
‚Ä¢ Analyzes weather, traffic news, social media & routes
‚Ä¢ Provides intelligent commute recommendations
‚Ä¢ Sends alerts via Slack/Telegram

**Setup Required:**
1. Add API credentials in n8n Settings
2. Set HOME_ADDRESS & OFFICE_ADDRESS variables
3. Configure notification channels

**Free APIs Used:**
‚Ä¢ OpenWeatherMap (30k calls/month free)
‚Ä¢ Google Maps (40k calls/month free) 
‚Ä¢ Bright Data (1k calls/month free)

**Total Cost: $0.00/month** ‚úÖ

‚è∞ **SCHEDULE TRIGGER**

Runs 4 times daily:
‚Ä¢ 7:00 AM - Morning commute
‚Ä¢ 8:00 AM - Late morning
‚Ä¢ 5:00 PM - Evening commute  
‚Ä¢ 6:00 PM - Late evening

Only on weekdays (Mon-Fri)

üìù **Cron Pattern:**
`0 0 7,8,17,18 * * 1-5`

üí° **Tip:** Adjust times based on your commute schedule

üå§Ô∏è **WEATHER INTELLIGENCE**

**Current Weather:**
‚Ä¢ Temperature, humidity, visibility
‚Ä¢ Rain detection
‚Ä¢ Fog/mist conditions

**Forecast (3h intervals):**
‚Ä¢ Next 24 hours prediction
‚Ä¢ Rain probability
‚Ä¢ Severe weather alerts

**Bangalore Impact:**
‚Ä¢ Light rain: +15-25 min
‚Ä¢ Heavy rain: +45-60 min
‚Ä¢ Waterlogging: Avoid Silk Board, KR Puram

üîë **API:** OpenWeatherMap (FREE)

üì∞ **TRAFFIC DATA COLLECTION**

**News Sources:**
‚Ä¢ Times of India, Deccan Herald
‚Ä¢ The Hindu, Bangalore Mirror
‚Ä¢ Keywords: accidents, closures, protests

**Social Media:**
‚Ä¢ Twitter hashtags: #BengaluruTraffic
‚Ä¢ Real-time crowd-sourced updates
‚Ä¢ Locations: ORR, Electronic City, Whitefield

**Official Sources:**
‚Ä¢ Traffic Police Bangalore
‚Ä¢ Government transport sites
‚Ä¢ Live incidents & diversions

üîë **API:** Bright Data (FREE tier)

üó∫Ô∏è **ROUTE OPTIMIZATION**

**Primary Routes:**
‚Ä¢ Real-time traffic data
‚Ä¢ Multiple alternatives
‚Ä¢ Best-guess traffic model

**Alternative Routes:**
‚Ä¢ Avoids highways
‚Ä¢ Local road options
‚Ä¢ Comparison analysis

**Features:**
‚Ä¢ Departure time: NOW
‚Ä¢ Traffic-aware duration
‚Ä¢ Distance calculations
‚Ä¢ Route summaries

üîë **API:** Google Maps (FREE)

üß† **AI DECISION ENGINE**

**Intelligent Scoring:**
‚Ä¢ Route duration analysis
‚Ä¢ Weather impact calculation
‚Ä¢ News incident detection
‚Ä¢ Social media sentiment
‚Ä¢ Official traffic severity

**Output:**
‚Ä¢ Best route recommendation
‚Ä¢ Confidence score (0-100%)
‚Ä¢ Weather impact assessment
‚Ä¢ Active traffic alerts
‚Ä¢ Alternative route options

**Smart Features:**
‚Ä¢ Time-based recommendations
‚Ä¢ Emergency condition detection
‚Ä¢ Data quality assessment

üö® **EMERGENCY ALERTS**

Triggers when:
‚Ä¢ Confidence < 30%
‚Ä¢ Bandh/complete closure detected
‚Ä¢ Heavy rain + multiple alerts
‚Ä¢ Commute > 2-3 hours

**Actions:**
‚Ä¢ Immediate notifications
‚Ä¢ Work-from-home suggestions
‚Ä¢ Alternative day recommendations

**Prevents:**
‚Ä¢ Getting stuck in severe traffic
‚Ä¢ Wasted commute time
‚Ä¢ Safety risks

üì± **SMART NOTIFICATIONS**

**Slack Integration:**
‚Ä¢ Rich message blocks
‚Ä¢ Interactive buttons
‚Ä¢ Confidence scores
‚Ä¢ Data source metrics
‚Ä¢ Direct map links

**Telegram Integration:**
‚Ä¢ Markdown formatting
‚Ä¢ Inline keyboards
‚Ä¢ Alternative notification channel

**Features:**
‚Ä¢ One-click map opening
‚Ä¢ Refresh data option
‚Ä¢ Emergency escalation
‚Ä¢ Professional formatting

‚öôÔ∏è **SETUP CHECKLIST**

**Required Credentials:**
‚òê OpenWeatherMap API key
‚òê Google Maps API key  
‚òê Bright Data API token
‚òê Slack API token
‚òê Telegram Bot token (optional)

**Environment Variables:**
‚òê HOME_ADDRESS
‚òê OFFICE_ADDRESS
‚òê SLACK_CHANNEL
‚òê TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID

**Testing:**
‚òê Run individual nodes
‚òê Test complete workflow
‚òê Verify notifications

üí∞ **All APIs have FREE tiers!**
